attributes.action: ask the police to question the m.p,s who have clearly commited fraud on their expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Funny how  all the m.p,s have bad accounting errors on their morgage payments on their non existing morgage.This is Fraud plain and simply.Send them to court.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
